articles.description: There's an elephant in the room when it comes to the new Disney+/Hulu series.
articles.content:
Pam and Tommy
 – a retelling of the 1995 Pamela Anderson and Tommy Lee sex tape scandal – is arguably one of Hulu's most anticipated releases ever. 
Starring Lily James and Sebastian Stan as the ic… [+6868 chars]
